title: Omicron Reinfects Government
sub_head: Covid strategy needs a midcourse correction. It got Joe Biden’s vaccine mandate.
body:
One might expect the Omicron variant of Covid-19 to provide useful lessons for the way governments deal with the coronavirus pandemic. It won’t.
Public officials cite “science,” but they’ve been flying mostly by the seat of their pants since the pandemic went public in early 2020.
